level.heading: Community health reinvestment.
level.text: A corporation shall engage in community health reinvestment to the maximum feasible extent consistent with financial soundness and efficiency.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 31-3506.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-369
level.text: For Law 17-369, see notes following ยง 31-3501.
